*. Andrew Johnson, who succeeded Lincoln, was born in 1808. Lyndon Johnson, who succeeded Kennedy, was born in 1908.
*. Lincoln was shot in the Ford Theatre. Kennedy was shot in a Lincoln, made by Ford.
